Groww is a user-friendly investment app offering zero-commission mutual funds, stock trading, digital gold, and US equities. Its clean interface suits beginners, with fast account setup and transparent pricing. While advanced tools are limited, its ideal for mobile-first investors seeking simplicity and reliability. Great for learning and growing wealth digitally.

Why the balance in Groww is always a guesswork? No transparency. I had around 9k in Groww balance, but then now only showing 2k something. And sometimes it shows 6k, why 2k now? Where did you eat the rest? And you say every day the profit I earn Wil be added by the end of the day, where it will be added, I've never seen getting added in my bank account. There's an option to see all transactions, but I don't see any justifiable transaction for the money you ate. Profits don't get added either.

My experience with Groww has been negative . Unexplained deductions from my account raise serious trust concerns. I would not recommend using this app for secure investments. Safer alternatives like Zerodha or Upstox may be better options.

I've been using the Groww app for a while now, and it's fantastic for tracking investments, mutual funds, and buyingselling stocks. The UI is clean, and it's beginner-friendly. However, one feature that could take it to the next level would be stock recommendations for both long-term investments and short-term trades (like swing trading). It would be super helpful to get insights, expert analysis, or even curated stock lists based on different time horizons and risk appetites.

This is one of the best platforms for investment, but applying for an IPO is frustrating. Recently, the application process gets stuck on "sending application to exchange," failing to generate a number or send a mandate. Other platforms like AngelOne and INDmoney are much faster. But I prefer using Groww, so I often have to cancel and reapply to get my application submitted, which is especially stressful on the final day.

There is no such thing as "zero brokerage" there are so many hidden brokerage and govt taxes which the app doesn't mention at all. it shows a negligible value for ex 0.004% but it's a scam, I buyed one stock of 220 normally exchangetaxes would be 1-2 extra but after a trade when I opened my contract note (full transaction history taxes their hidden brokerage values) I had to pay 5 per share that's 3% !!!! it's a clear loot and scam of these guys to lure beginner traders.
